title: Service Quality Practical Competency Enhancement: College Preparation English Reading Education Design for Secondary Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Everyday English reading proficiency and basic grammar understanding
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can comprehend academic English texts (500–800 words) with over 70% accuracy.
Students can analyze texts of various genres (explanatory, argumentative, reports) according to structural elements (introduction-body-conclusion).
Through PBL activities, students can synthesize English research materials to produce a 2,000-character report.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
